title: Harmony Hidden Picture
subtitle: By Arie Van De Graaff
content: An important power was restored to Joseph Smith and Oliver Cowdery in a beautiful wooded area near Harmony, Pennsylvania, in 1829. Write the first letter of each animal in the spaces below. The letter “I” for insects has been filled in for you. Unscramble the letters to find out what this important power is. Find the
Can you also find these items in the picture?
